Magic Items



While taking MAS.S65: “Indistinguishable From… Magic as Interface, Technology, and Tradition” at the Media Lab during spring 2016 I designed and fabricated 2 magic items using BLE technology:

A remeberball - like the one described in Harry Potter - a small ball that blinks red if it’s holder forgot anything.

Magic Wands - That controls different elements in the room only by their moevment.

April 2016
